item.title: Lecture 1: Introduction to Econometrics
item.description: class: inverse, center, middle What is Econometrics? Why Everyone, Yes Everyone, Should Learn Statistics .center[.image-40[]] Why Everyone, Yes Everyone, Should Learn Statistics .center[.image-30[]] We’re Not so Good at Statistics Votes in the U.S. House of Representatives in favor of passing the Civil Rights Act of 1964: Democrat Republican 61% 80% – Simple enough: “on average, Republicans tended to vote for passage more than Democrats” We’re Not so Good at Statistics Broken down further by Northern vs.
